name: Big Couch Media Group
description:
Big Couch Media Group is a leading strategic consulting and integrated interactive agency focused on providing results oriented and innovative solutions for entrepeneurial growth companies in the areas of ecommerce, content publishing, social networking, and emerging digital technologies. The Big Couch Media Group suite of services include:
- Interactive Design & Development (Drupal)
- Cloud Computing and Hosting Services
- iPhone Application Development
- Interactive Marketing
- Online Media Sales Management
- Business Development/Partnership Marketing
- Strategic Consulting / Business Planning
Big Couch Media Group has assembled a dynamic team of experienced individuals to lead each of its core service offerings.
